name: Starlife
overview: We are in the Middle Ages; beings from another planet have landed on Earth not with very good intentions. Let's do some history. A few years ago the feudal lord of our county appointed me defender of our village for life. How could I imagine this to happen? The only one that we know about the strange beings is that they are on the outskirts and through the mouth of an old man (old man) who does not he was very lucid. It turns out that the formerly said aliens, their energy is running out, and the only thing that could replacing it was the STARLIFE, which was also on the best planet in the universe. The best is not I say for its virtues, but because its inhabitants were sufficiently "cousins", to be able to catch without any problem. He he!! What they don't know is that our alter ego will defend us. Why is it like that? The answer is in your hands, although personally I do not think you will get it; you are not good enough for such an endeavor. Or maybe yes?
